properties.descriptionEn: #### Organization Overview
properties.descriptionFr: #### Organization Overview

properties.titleEn: Describe how your organization is interested in participating in large-scale cost-shared tree planting projects
properties.titleFr: Describe how your organization is interested in participating in large-scale cost-shared tree planting projects
properties.descriptionEn: Check all boxes that apply and briefly provide more details in the space below if required
properties.descriptionFr: Check all boxes that apply and briefly provide more details in the space below if required

choices.en: Implement tree planting projects from beginning to end, including monitoring trees for continued health (for example, undertaking a project or projects from sourcing trees and land for project, securing labour and overseeing tree planting, to monitoring and reporting on results)
choices.fr: Implement tree planting projects from beginning to end, including monitoring trees for continued health (for example, undertaking a project or projects from sourcing trees and land for project, securing labour and overseeing tree planting, to monitoring and reporting on results)

choices.en: Provide tree planting services (for example, a company that provides labour and logistics for tree planting projects)
choices.fr: Provide tree planting services (for example, a company that provides labour and logistics for tree planting projects)

choices.en: Supply seedlings and trees for tree planting projects (for example nursery with capacity for growth)
choices.fr: Supply seedlings and trees for tree planting projects (for example nursery with capacity for growth)

choices.en: Provide land for tree planting (for example community or landowning organization with interest in having trees planted on their land)
choices.fr: Provide land for tree planting (for example community or landowning organization with interest in having trees planted on their land)

choices.en: Sponsor or invest in tree planting projects (for example, corporate donations or fundraising)
choices.fr: Sponsor or invest in tree planting projects (for example, corporate donations or fundraising)

properties.titleFr: In the context of your interest in participating in the Growing Canada’s Forests program, what would be the top three factors that would enable or facilitate your participation and describe how your organization will address these factors?
properties.descriptionEn: (For example, securing funding to expand your operations, securing a source of seedlings/trees, finding access to land, finding labour, monitoring the trees for survivability, etc.)
properties.descriptionFr: (For example, securing funding to expand your operations, securing a source of seedlings/trees, finding access to land, finding labour, monitoring the trees for survivability, etc.)

properties.descriptionEn: #### Project Overview
properties.descriptionFr: #### Project Overview

properties.titleEn: Where applicable to your organization type, please provide brief answers to all the sections below.
properties.titleFr: Where applicable to your organization type, please provide brief answers to all the sections below.
properties.descriptionEn: Be as concise as possible with your responses; however, do not leave out important information in order to be brief. Answer all sections that apply as best as you can. Incomplete forms will be considered as part of the information gathering exercise.
properties.descriptionFr: Be as concise as possible with your responses; however, do not leave out important information in order to be brief. Answer all sections that apply as best as you can. Incomplete forms will be considered as part of the information gathering exercise.

properties.titleEn: Proposed approach for activities
properties.titleFr: Proposed approach for activities
properties.descriptionEn: Description of the key activities your organization would like to carry out in the context of implementing one or more tree planting projects/initiatives. If applicable, include how you will ensure that the right trees are planted in the right location, seeking authorizations from appropriate authorities (if required), and post-planting activities like monitoring for tree health and survival and reporting on project outcomes
properties.descriptionFr: Description of the key activities your organization would like to carry out in the context of implementing one or more tree planting projects/initiatives. If applicable, include how you will ensure that the right trees are planted in the right location, seeking authorizations from appropriate authorities (if required), and post-planting activities like monitoring for tree health and survival and reporting on project outcomes

properties.titleEn: Readiness and Capacity Building
properties.titleFr: Readiness and Capacity Building
properties.descriptionEn: Describe your organization’s experience and readiness as it relates to your proposed contribution to the Growing Canada’s Forests program. Describe any capacity building needs or potential gaps in your ability to participate
properties.descriptionFr: Describe your organization’s experience and readiness as it relates to your proposed contribution to the Growing Canada’s Forests program. Describe any capacity building needs or potential gaps in your ability to participate

properties.titleEn: GHG Emission Reductions and Co-Benefits
properties.titleFr: GHG Emission Reductions and Co-Benefits
properties.descriptionEn: Describe how your proposed project will seek to maximize greenhouse gas (GHG) emission reductions or carbon sequestration (for example, by selecting planting sites where no or minimal vegetation removal is required).  GHG impacts do not need to be quantified at this stage.  Also describe how your proposed project will lead to environmental and human well-being co-benefits (for example, increasing biodiversity to increase ecosystem resilience to climate change, creating more green spaces for your community, creating green jobs, etc.)
properties.descriptionFr: Describe how your proposed project will seek to maximize greenhouse gas (GHG) emission reductions or carbon sequestration (for example, by selecting planting sites where no or minimal vegetation removal is required).  GHG impacts do not need to be quantified at this stage.  Also describe how your proposed project will lead to environmental and human well-being co-benefits (for example, increasing biodiversity to increase ecosystem resilience to climate change, creating more green spaces for your community, creating green jobs, etc.)

properties.descriptionEn: #### General Questions for Program Delivery Consideration
properties.descriptionFr: #### General Questions for Program Delivery Consideration

properties.titleEn: Regardless of whether or not you have a project(s) in mind as part of your response to this RFI, we would welcome feedback on the following questions.
properties.titleFr: Regardless of whether or not you have a project(s) in mind as part of your response to this RFI, we would welcome feedback on the following questions.
properties.descriptionEn: Please keep in mind, the responses to these questions will help inform and identify the most appropriate program delivery scenarios of a future funded Request for Proposals (RFPs) with respect to implementing or contributing to large-scale single or multi-year projects.
properties.descriptionFr: Please keep in mind, the responses to these questions will help inform and identify the most appropriate program delivery scenarios of a future funded Request for Proposals (RFPs) with respect to implementing or contributing to large-scale single or multi-year projects.

properties.descriptionEn: #### Diversity and Inclusion
properties.descriptionFr: #### Diversity and Inclusion

properties.titleEn: The Government of Canada is committed to equality and diversity so that all Canadians have the opportunity to participate in and contribute to the growth of the economy.
properties.titleFr: The Government of Canada is committed to equality and diversity so that all Canadians have the opportunity to participate in and contribute to the growth of the economy.
properties.descriptionEn: Please note: Providing answers to the question below will not adversely affect the assessment of your EOI. If your organization does not wish to answer the question, please leave the fields blank.
properties.descriptionFr: Please note: Providing answers to the question below will not adversely affect the assessment of your EOI. If your organization does not wish to answer the question, please leave the fields blank.

properties.descriptionEn: #### Authorization
properties.descriptionFr: #### Authorization

properties.titleEn: Notice to Applicants
properties.titleFr: Notice to Applicants
properties.descriptionEn: The use and distribution of information collected through this Expression of Interest (EOI) will comply with both the Privacy Act and the Access to Information Act.
properties.descriptionFr: The use and distribution of information collected through this Expression of Interest (EOI) will comply with both the Privacy Act and the Access to Information Act.

properties.titleEn: Pursuant to Privacy Act
properties.titleFr: Pursuant to Privacy Act
properties.descriptionEn: The program will keep confidential any personal information it may collect and will not disclose or transmit said information without your written consent.
properties.descriptionFr: The program will keep confidential any personal information it may collect and will not disclose or transmit said information without your written consent.

properties.titleEn: Pursuant to Access of Information Act
properties.titleFr: Pursuant to Access of Information Act
properties.descriptionEn: The program will protect from disclosure any information of a financial, commercial, scientific or technical nature it collects from you so long as you treat said information as confidential in your own establishment. If you choose to send the information or other confidential information to the program by e-mail, the program will respond by email. Similarly, if your correspondence is through regular mail, the program’s response will be in like manner. However, in all cases, the program will use e-mail correspondence to you for all non-confidential matters.
properties.descriptionFr: The program will protect from disclosure any information of a financial, commercial, scientific or technical nature it collects from you so long as you treat said information as confidential in your own establishment. If you choose to send the information or other confidential information to the program by e-mail, the program will respond by email. Similarly, if your correspondence is through regular mail, the program’s response will be in like manner. However, in all cases, the program will use e-mail correspondence to you for all non-confidential matters.

properties.titleEn: By checking the box below, you are providing the program with consent to use your information
properties.titleFr: By checking the box below, you are providing the program with consent to use your information
properties.descriptionEn: We might share it with the program’s employees, external consultants, review committee members, officials in other departments (federal, provincial and territorial) for the purposes assessing the merits of your EOI and for formulating internal policy analysis
properties.descriptionFr: We might share it with the program’s employees, external consultants, review committee members, officials in other departments (federal, provincial and territorial) for the purposes assessing the merits of your EOI and for formulating internal policy analysis

choices.fr: I have read and agree with the statement above

properties.titleEn: By checking the box below you certify that you have read the Early Start Applicant Guide
properties.titleFr: By checking the box below you certify that you have read the Early Start Applicant Guide

properties.descriptionFr: This means that you understand that this EOI does not constitute, nor should it be construed, in any manner whatsoever, as creating an obligation on NRCan to fund the proposed project
